Class FileManager

java.lang.Object
FileManager
public class FileManager extends Object

FileManager class

Contains methods for writing to and reading from database

    • readFromFile

      public static String[][] readFromFile​(String filename, int n)
      Reads data from a text file (data must be delimited by pipe ("|") characters )
      Parameters:
      filename - the filename as a String
      n - n, the number of data points for the object type being read
      Returns:
      the object data as a 2D String array

    • getItemIds

      public static String getItemIds​(ArrayList<MenuItem> items)

      Returns:
